attributes.action: Allow all non-resident citizens to vote in national elections and referendums
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May as PM promised just such a change. It hasn't happened and it's time the promise was kept.
attributes.background: UK citizens living abroad lose the vote in national elections and referendums after 15 years. Since these will almost certainly affect non-resident citizens and their families, often in dramatic ways, it would greatly enhance democracy to restore these rights, in line with many  western democracies.
